text: Khabardar, deen e khalis Allah ka haqq hai.Rahey woh log jinhon ne uske siwa dusre sarparst bana rakkhe hain (aur apne is fail ki taujeeh yeh karte hain ke) hum to unki ibadat sirf is liye karte hain ke woh Allah tak hamari rasayi karadein (bring us nearer to Allah).Allah yaqeenan unke darmiyan un tamaam baaton ka faisla kardega jin mein woh ikhtilaf kar rahey hain. Allah kisi aisey shaks ko hidayat nahin deta jo jhoota aur munkir e haqq ho
